title: Ollyball Planet Earth, The Ultimate Indoor Play Ball, Colourable Ball, Suitable for Indoor and Outdoor Play, Educational Toy
features: Patented KrunchCOR construction absorbs impact, will not break windows! This super lightweight ball means that kids can play ball safely in the house.
COLOUR-IN your Ollyball Planet Earth with any marker or crayon! With 150 countries, islands, rivers and territories to colour and explore!
Shell made from high-performance material that is upcycled and sustainable
Easily inflate or deflate with the included straw. Ships deflated. Simply follow the easy instructions for inflation
Great for rainy days, snowy days and parties! Ollyball is waterproof, and can be played with indoors or outdoors!
description: From the manufacturer Ollyball- The Ultimate Keepy Uppy Ball! Ollyball is the Ultimate Indoor Play Ball designed for full-speed and full-force indoor play. This super lightweight ball absorbs shock with its patented KrunchCOR construction. Kids can now safely play ball in the house in any weather, day or night, without the risk of damaging furniture or breaking windows! With the Planet Earth Ollyball, kids can learn about different countries and continents as they colour! Ollyball- The Ultimate Keepy Uppy Ball! Ollyball is the Ultimate Indoor Play Ball designed for full-speed and full-force indoor play. This super lightweight ball absorbs shock with its patented KrunchCOR construction. Kids can now safely play ball in the house in any weather, day or night, without the risk of damaging furniture or breaking windows! With the Planet Earth Ollyball, kids can learn about different countries and continents as they colour! Ollyball- The Ultimate Keepy Uppy Ball! Ollyball is the Ultimate Indoor Play Ball designed for full-speed and full-force indoor play. This super lightweight ball absorbs shock with its patented KrunchCOR construction. Kids can now safely play ball in the house in any weather, day or night, without the risk of damaging furniture or breaking windows! With the Planet Earth Ollyball, kids can learn about different countries and continents as they colour! Colour in your Ollyball! You can colour in your Ollyball with any markers or crayons, to customise it and make your Ollyball your own! Full-speed, full-force indoor playball! Patented KrunchCOR construction absorbs impact, will not break windows! This super lightweight ball means that kids can play ball safely in the house. Suitable for ages 4 - 99! Perfect for kids and adults to play with, inside and out! Get them up and away from screens! Lots of play benefits! Great play benefits including hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills. Helps to encourage creative and active play! The perfect gift for boys and girls! Ollyball is the perfect gift for active children. It also makes a great toy for when you are on the go; it is easy to inflate or deflate with the included straw. Ships deflated. Simply follow the easy instructions for inflation. Ollyball PLANET EARTH is a 22” MEGA-sized ball that can be coloured in with any marker or crayon, featuring over 150 countries, islands, rivers, and territories to explore.
